thread.title: Vicky Pattison reveals she’s lost two stone in six weeks as she hints at wedding plans with boyfriend John Noble
thread.title_full: Vicky Pattison reveals she’s lost two stone in six weeks as she hints at wedding plans with boyfriend John Noble

author: jkavanagh
title: Vicky Pattison reveals she’s lost two stone in six weeks as she hints at wedding plans with boyfriend John Noble
text:
Comments VICKY Pattison has revealed she has lost a massive TWO STONE in just SIX WEEKS. 
She has also hinted that she has been getting into shape for a wedding dress – she has been dating hunky John Noble since November. INSTAGRAM 5 Vicky Pattison says she has lost two stone in six weeks 
The former Geordie Shore babe has been unveiling her new body over the last few weeks with a succession of sexy selfies which show off her incredible weight-loss. News Group Newspapers Ltd 5 She says she was bigger before Christmas – pictured here in November 2016 
But in today’s Heat magazine , she talked about how she achieved her goal and has got the figure she has always dreamed of. 
She said: “I came out of the jungle a lean, mean Queen [in December 2015] – I was just over 9st. INSTAGRAM 5 She has been showing off her body in sexy selfies 
“But then I was sucked into a life of daytime TV, night-time panel shows, evening events, late restaurant dates and very little sleep with a lot of drink. 
“I ended up being over 11st by the end of the year.” INSTAGRAM 5 She revealed she got her dream body through HIIT workouts and a high-protein diet 
Talking about her fitness regime she said: “HIIT workouts and a high-protein diet. I only have a small amount of rye bread, sweet potato or brown rice with dinner.” 
She also said that although she hasn’t quit the booze, she only has it now as a “treat”. Rex Features 5 She showed off her svelte frame at the recent NTAs 
Speaking of whether she was getting in shape to get married she said: “Well, listen, I’m starting to think this will be my wedding body. 
“That’s not far off, I don’t think.” related stories Here's what you need to know about Love Island 2017 DIVISIVE DUO Meet Ottavio and Bradley aka Bratavio - divisive musical duo and X Factor 2016 finalists SHEERLY NOT! Lady Victoria Hervey throws caution to the wind as she steps out without her bra in see-through outfit PAST MISTAKES Loose Women's Andrea McLean admits she's 'haunted by every wrong decision' due to her career AMAL YOU NEED TO KNOW George Clooney is 'happy and excited' that his wife Amal is pregnant with twins CHANGING LIVES Who is Nick Knowles? DIY SOS and Who Dares Wins presenter and father of four - all you need to know SOAP SHOCKS Emmerdale boss reveals massive spoilers including Ashley' death, Emma's confession and a secret love triangle RAGS TO RICHES All you need to know about Chloe Khan, who has spoken out after her stalker hell A DOG'S LIFE The Secret Life of Dogs is on TONIGHT! Find out what the show about and what channel it's on THE THICKE OF IT 'Abuse', a custody battle and plenty of allegations...Inside Paula Patton and Robin Thicke's bitter divorce No kidding Stacey Solomon doesn't want a baby with Joe Swash as she doesn't want her children to have different dads THE WAY WE WERE 5 Vicky said there could be wedding bells on the cards with her and boyfriend John Noble 
Meanwhile, she recently posted a picture of how she looked before and how she looked next to it, she wrote next to it: “Late as yesterday was a write off… But here is my #TransformationTuesday… I am very proud of everything I’ve achieved over the last couple years including my fitness and nutrition journey!! A post shared by Vicky Pattison (@vickypattison) on Feb 15, 2017 at 9:27am PST 
“I’m human, it hasn’t been without its ups and downs (literally) but I’m aiming for balance this year and so far so good!! I want every woman out there who is keen to make positive changes to their lifestyle and start living a more fulfilling and adventurous life to check out @minivnutrition.”
